channel.title: PLAXIS Events Feed
channel.description: Informing on the latest PLAXIS Events
channel.copyright: Copyright 2025, Seequent, the Bentley Subsurface Company

item.title: Coffee Corner: Geosynthetic Reinforced Soil: Practical Applications and Modeling in PLAXIS(May 13 2025)
item.description: Join our PLAXIS Coffee Corner to explore Geosynthetic Reinforced Soil (GRS) applications like MSE walls and slope stability. Learn about material parameter selection and modeling techniques and interpreting numerical results for accurate simulations. Enhance your geotechnical skills!

item.title: Coffee Corner: Boost Your Geotechnical Modelling Efficiency with PLAXIS Automation (April 8 2025)
item.description: This Coffee Corner webinar on April 8 2025 will teach you how Python scripts can simplify and enhance your geotechnical modeling tasks in PLAXIS. We'll cover practical examples of automating geometry creation. Utilizing the SoilTest facility when calibrating material parameters and fine-tuning phase settings to improve calculation accuracy and efficiency.

item.title: Standard Course on Computational Geotechnics (6-9 May 2025) The Netherlands
item.description: Join the PLAXIS Standard course in The Netherlands May 6-9 2025

item.title: Coffee Corner: Swelling Rock in PLAXIS
item.description: Watch this on-demand Coffee Corner webinar for an introduction to the new and updated Swelling Rock model in PLAXIS

item.title: Coffee Corner: Understanding Undrained Soil Behaviour: Insights and Applications in PLAXIS
item.description: Watch this on-demand Coffee Corner webinar: Undrained soil behavior plays a critical role in geotechnical engineering. In this webinar we show how this can be modelled in PLAXIS
